title: Avodat HaMelekh on Mishneh Torah, Transmission of the Oral Law
versionSource: Avodat HaMelekh on Mishneh Torah, Transmission of the Oral Law : Halakhah 8
versionTitle: Avodat HaMelekh on Mishneh Torah, Transmission of the Oral Law : Halakhah 8 [pt]
heTitle: עבודת המלך על משנה תורה, מסירת תורה שבעל פה
text: "Shma'aya e Avtalyon, conversos à justiça. Gittin 57b e no caso do Cohen Gadol em Yoma."
